ABOUT IREZ

IREZ Academy is an organization providing world class training and certification in different aspects of educational field such as Technical, Management, Safety, and interior designing. IREZ offer unique opportunity to face challenges through enriched learning, academic excellence, professional training and corporate exposure. We deliver courses and examinations to all major industry sectors such as Oil and Gas, Construction, Power and automotive. In IREZ engineering wing world class trainers deliver unrivalled quality of training and assessment leading to internationally recognized qualifications in demand by industry worldwide.

START YOUR SAFE CAREER WITH IREZ

We offer unique opportunity to face challenges through enriched learning, academic excellence, professional training and corporate exposure

We are diverse, welcoming, accepting and passionate about being the best we can be. Join us to make your carrier unforgettable.

OUR LATEST PLACEMENTS

Previous
Next

We promise you to deliver the assured quality

foundational skills and knowledge

CREDITABLE INTEGERITY

We are committed to giving our 100% effort.

TEAM WORK

Why Choose Us?

A choice that makes the difference.

QUALITY POLICY

QUALITY POLICY

We are committed to imparting quality technical education and training, in pursuit of becoming the global technical institution through continuous improvement in its scholastic ability and effectiveness through the quality management system. The quality policy is communicated and understood by all stakeholders, employees, students and all those who are connected with the institute and review for persistence and perseverance.

OUR HISTORY

OUR HISTORY

Irez Academy Is An Organization Providing World Class Training And Certification In Different Aspects Of Educational Field Such As Technical, Management, Safety, And Interior Designing. Irez Offer Unique Opportunity To Face Challenges Through Enriched Learning, Academic Excellence, Professional Training, And Corporate Exposure. We Deliver Courses And Examinations To All Major Industry Sectors Such As Oil And Gas, Construction, Power, And Automotive. In Irez Engineering Wing World Class Trainers Deliver Unrivalled Quality Of Training And Assessment Leading To Internationally Recognized Qualifications In Demand By Industry Worldwide.

PROFESSIONAL TRAINING

PROFESSIONAL TRAINING

Prestigious degrees obtained by spending your valuable time and money need not always guarantee a lucrative career. In many cases, the degree may leave you with pure academic knowledge which often is insufficient in the real world. We provide valuable hands on training which advances your career and enhances your employability. The certification and training process occurs in consonance with your main course so that you do not lose time in learning. Our courses are student friendly and student centric. Our Certifying agencies are recognised worldwide and this ensures that you are in demand anytime anywhere. universally recognised certification. 

Golden feathers in our crown..........

Previous
Next

We are Professional

We are Trusted

We are Experts

What Student Say's

DEEPU S

“ Irez helped me get the start of my career I was looking for. Giving practical knowledge for what I planned to do, and getting me into a job that I am happy in. ”

Adarsh Sivan

“ It was very good training. Extra knowledge, helps a lot. Help full sites and information. Overall very good experience, got a good knowledge.. ”

Arun Albin

“ Excellent training experience 100% practical, trainer has in-depth knowledge. Excellent facilities can get recording of the training if you miss it. ”

Lal Krishna

“I couldn’t be more pleased about how my time and money was spent going with this program. Thanks again you guys, I really appreciate it”

Jijo George

“ I joined Irez as I was sure to get best coaching in addition to regular classes. The tutorial session help me to boost my rank"

Muhammad Azhar

It was very good training. Extra knowledge, helps a lot. Help full sites and information. Overall very good experience, got a good knowledge.

Irez Academy
4.6
Based on 338 reviews
review us on
Devika B
09:29 08 Nov 22
I had attended the online Medical coding course in Irez Academy.The teaching faculties are very supportive, helpful, clearing all our doubts, explains everything in simple easy way. I am completely satisfied with online classes. I am so glad to be a part of Irez Academy.
Kezia BSK
07:13 08 Nov 22
I did my Medical Coding course here for 4 months... The facilities and learning environment is good here... A good institute to opt for.... The facilities nd staffs are present for all sorts of help... Altogether a good institute to Opt for...
Anjali Archa
06:30 08 Nov 22
I have done medical coding in 4 months in this institute...Good teaching by nafsy mam. This Institute provides best faculties for students. Faculties are available at all times and they continuously follow up students and make them competent. They are very helpful for me.
anzy khan
06:11 08 Nov 22
I have done the medical coding course with Irez Academy. Teaching was good.Tutor(Ms. Jojimol) is really aware of what she is explaining.She helped me a lot to finish my class with my comfortable time. And the staffs are also very helpful to clarify our concerns.
Gourisankar v v
05:33 28 Oct 22
Best institute for NEBOSH and othercourses. I completed my NEBOSH course here.This Institute provides best faculties for students. Faculties are available at all times and they continuously follow up students and make them competent. All the students studying here will pass at first attempt only because of their hardwork and follow up.
nithin krishnan
06:51 08 Oct 22
Definitely an amazing experience. I am really happy for the teaching provided. If you are looking for a trusted Institute please go ahead.. Thank you..
JEFFIN JOHN
09:40 06 Oct 22
I completed my TUV certification from irez academy Kollam. It's a great institute and the way of teaching was excellent and the tutor was so energetic and informative so as of that I got new knowledges of relevant fields
Jomin Joy
05:06 30 Jul 22
Idid NEBOSH exam from Irez accademy kollam. This is very good accademy full time support from the office and the teaching person. I feel very comfortable from this accademy and good class and very good experienced teachers they provide and. The teaching person are doing lot of mock exam and mock project that lots to help me for the exam. I suggest every my friends to this accademy
Anandhu C Devaraj
06:28 09 Jul 22
Teaching was excellent with good interaction. Knowledge sharing is good. Recording facility is excellent for revising. Course was practically informative. Tutor is enthusiastic and really aware of what he is explaining. The course helped me to build confidence, Valuable experiences and learning.Especially need to tell about their service very friendly and polite staff
